explanation: [0-0] On an empty road, there are three motorcyclists, all wearing black clothes. The person on the left is wearing a green helmet and riding a green motorcycle. The one in the middle is wearing a black helmet and riding a red motorcycle. The person on the right is wearing a yellow helmet and riding a silver motorcycle. There's also a blue and yellow barrel on the road. On the left side of the road, there are many motorcycles. There are other motorcyclists behind.

[0-9] The rider with the yellow helmet rides forward and performs a stunt, skillfully lifting the rear wheel and riding only on the front wheel. He shakes the body slightly and loses balance when the rear wheel touches the ground, causing the motorcycle to overturn and fall to the ground. The motorcycle continues to move forward due to inertia. The referee in black quickly walks towards the motorcycle, and the rider with the yellow helmet gets up and turns to look at the motorcycle.
